name: Dumpy's Quest
description:
* work in progress / experimental *

Dumpy, the proprietor of the Nappy Pixel and Dumpy's Discount Liquor, is abducted into outer space along with his desk clerk, and his football buddy.  Anything can happen, and the motley crew must combine their specialties to escape outer space, and get back to the liquor store.

Check out the Dumpy's Quest Discord channel

Controls:
arrow keys to move, 'left shift' to switch between characters.
